witch; wizard; shaman; also pr. [wu2]

purpleculture_examples:
巫师 [ wū shī ]: wizard; magician
巫术 [ wū shù ]: witchcraft
巫婆 [ wū pó ]: witch; sorceress; female shaman
巫医 [ wū yī ]: witch doctor; medicine man; shaman
小巫见大巫 [ xiǎo wū jiàn dà wū ]: lit. minor magician in the presence of a great one (idiom); fig. to pale into insignificance by comparison

heisig_chinese_memo: The witch was very good at her work. She magicked an assembly line to produce all kinds of sorceress' merchandise. Shrewed businesswoman, I'd say.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the two men (人) work (工) with the shrine maiden
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The witch was very good at her work. She magicked an assembly line to produce all kinds of sorceress' merchandise. Shrewed businesswoman, I'd say.
humanum_full_description_en:
Xu Zhongshu believes that the inscriptions on the inscriptions on the armor and the gold are like two overlapping jade. Jade was a spiritual object in ancient times. Ancient wizards used jade to sacrifice to the gods. So jade is used to represent the wizard. Zou Jing Heng considered as two " workers " in the shape of an overlap. Zhang Risheng believes that the shape of a buce is a shaver, and the shaver is a tool of a wizard, like a rule is a tool of a craftsman, so Xu Shen said "agree with the worker." "Said Wen": "Witch, I wish. Women can do things invisible by dancing to subdue gods. Like human beings dance. Agree with Gong. The ancients Wu Xian first became witches. All witches belong to witches. 𠮎(𢍮 ), ancient witchcraft."

The oracle bone inscription refers to the wizard and the object of sacrifice. "Collection" 32012: "The emperor (禘) is the witch", which means the sacrifice of the witch. Bronze script is used as a woman's character, Qi Wu Jiang Gui: "Qi Wu Jiang Zha (made) Zun 𣪕 (簋)".

The spring and autumn jade text indicates a wizard, "Hou Ma Mengshu" 156:22: "Witches wish history." "Mandarin. "Chu Yu": "It is called covet in the male, and the witch in the female." The stone inscriptions of the Warring States period indicate a wizard, "Curse Chu Wen. Wu Xian: "The Great God Wu Xian", "The Songs of Chu." "Li Sao": "Wu Xian will come down at night", Wang Yi's note: "Wu Xian, the ancient god and Wu Ye."

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are also used as the original meaning to indicate the wizard, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. Japanese Book A Type" Jian 94zheng 1: "The male is for seeing (covetous), the female is for witch".
humanum_short_description_en: A witch tool wielded by a skeptical wizard. Because the witch tool is used by a wizard, the witch tool is used to represent a wizard. The original meaning is a wizard.
humanum_full_description:
徐中舒認為甲金文象兩玉交疊之形，玉在古代是靈物，古代的巫師用玉來獻祭神靈。所以用玉來代表巫師。鄒景蘅認為象兩「工」器交疊之形。張日昇則認為象布策為筮之形，筮是巫師的道具，好比規矩是工匠的工具，所以許慎說「與工同意」。《說文》：「巫，祝也。女能事無形以舞降神者也。象人兩褎舞形。與工同意。古者巫咸初作巫。凡巫之屬皆从巫。𠮎(𢍮)，古文巫。」

　　甲骨文表示巫師，又是祭祀對象，《合集》32012：「帝(禘)于巫」，表示對巫進行禘祭。金文用作女子的字，齊巫姜簋：「齊巫姜乍(作)尊𣪕(簋)」。

　　春秋玉石文字表示巫師，《侯馬盟書》156:22：「巫覡祝史」。《國語．楚語》：「在男曰覡，在女曰巫」。戰國石刻文字表示巫師，《詛楚文．巫咸》：「大神巫咸」，《楚辭．離騷》：「巫咸將夕降兮」，王逸注：「巫咸，古神巫也。」

　　戰國竹簡也用作本義，表示巫師，《睡虎地秦簡．日書甲種》簡94正1：「男為見(覡)，女為巫」。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文疑象巫師所執的巫具，因為巫具為巫師所使用，故以巫具代表巫師，本義是巫師。

巫字的基本解释

巫
wū
以祈祷求神骗取财物的人：巫婆。女巫。男巫。巫术。小巫见大巫（喻小的跟大的一比，就显得小不如大）。
姓。

巫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wū］
［《廣韻》武夫切，平虞，微。］
(1)古代从事祈祷、卜筮、星占，并兼用药物为人求福、却灾、治病的人。商代巫的地位较高。周时分男巫、女巫，司职各异，同属司巫。春秋以后，医道渐从巫术中分出，但民间专行巫术、装神弄鬼为人祈祷治病者，仍世世不绝。
(2)通“誣”。参见“巫鼓”。
(3)姓。

巫字的英文翻译

◎ 巫
witch, wizard

巫字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【工字部】　巫； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页325第19
〔古文〕??【唐韻】武夫切【集韻】【正韻】微夫切【韻會】馮無切，?音無。【說文】祝也。女能事無形，以舞降神者也。象人兩褎舞形。【世本】巫咸始作巫。【楚語】古者民之精爽不攜二者，而又能齊肅中正，其知能上下比義，其聖能光遠宣朗，其明能光照之，其聰能聽徹之，如是則神明降之。在男曰覡，在女曰巫。【周禮·春官·神仕疏】男子陽有兩稱，曰巫，曰覡。女子隂不變，直名巫，無覡稱。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】南郡有巫縣。　又山名。【山海經】黑水之南有巫山。【左傳·襄十八年】齊侯登巫山，以望晉師。【註】在盧縣東北。【前漢·地理志註】巫山在巫縣西南。　又官名。【周禮·春官】司巫，掌羣巫之政令。又【夏官】巫馬掌養疾馬而乗，治之。　又巫咸，國名。【山海經】巫咸國，右手操靑蛇，左手操赤蛇，在登葆山，羣巫所從上下也。亦山名。【郭璞·巫咸山序】巫咸者，實以鴻術爲帝堯醫，生爲上公，死爲明神。豈封斯山而因以名之乎。　又人名。【山海經】開明東有巫彭，巫抵，巫陽，巫履，巫凡，巫相。【註】皆神

巫字的源字形

巫字的起名意思

古代称能以舞降神的人，装神弄鬼，装模作样，专搞迷信活动，骗取钱财的人。

witch
Basic explanation of words
witch
wū
People who deceive property by praying to God: witch. Witch. wizard. witchcraft. The little witch sees the big witch (Yu, when compared with the big one, the small is not as big as the big one).
name.
witch
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wū］
["Guangyun" Wu Fuqie, Pingyu, Wei. ]
(1) People who engaged in prayer, divination, and astrology in ancient times, and also used medicine to seek blessings, cure disasters, and cure diseases. The witches of the Shang Dynasty had a higher status. Zhou Shi divided into wizards and witches, all of whom had different duties, and both belonged to the sorceress. After the Spring and Autumn Period, the path of medicine has gradually separated from witchcraft, but folks who specialize in witchcraft and pretend to be ghosts and pray for healing are still endless.
(2) Through "false". See "Witch Drum".
(3) Last name.
witch
English translation of words
◎ Witch
witch, wizard
witch
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [I Character Department] 　 Witch; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 325 Page 19
〔古文〕??【Tang Yun】Wu Fuqie【Jiyun】【Zhengyun】Weifuqie 【Yunhui】Feng Wuqie, no sound. [Said the text] Zhu Ye. Female power is invisible, and it is also the one who surrenders to the gods through dance. It looks like a two-pronged dance. [Shiben] Wu Xian began to become a witch. [Chu language] The spirit of the ancient people does not carry the two, but can be upright, their knowledge can compare righteousness up and down, their holy energy is far and wide, their bright can illuminate it, and their cleverness can listen to it, if so. God descended on it. In the male it is covet, in the female it is the witch. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Shen Shi Shu] The male Yang has two titles, namely witch and covetous. The female's yin remains unchanged, and she has a straight name as a witch and has no covetous name.　Also the county name. [Former Han Geography] There is Wu County in the southern county.　Also the name of the mountain. [Shanhaijing] There is Wushan in the south of Heishui. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Eighteen Years] Qihou ascended to Wushan in order to look to Jinshi. [Note] In the northeast of Lu County. [Annotation to Geography of the Former Han Dynasty] Wushan is in the southwest of Wuxian County.　Also official name. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan】The decree of the witch and the witches. Also【Xiaguan】The witch horseshoe raises and rides on the horse, and cures it.　You Wu Xian, the name of the country. [Shan Hai Jing] Wu Xian Kingdom, the right hand is the snake, the left hand is the red snake, in Dengbao Mountain, the group of witches follow up and down. Yishan name. [Guo Pu·Wuxian Mountain Preface] The Wuxian practitioners actually take Hongshu as the emperor Yao's doctor, live as a grandfather, and die as a god. Qi Feng Sishan and because of the name almost.　Another name. [Shan Hai Jing] Enlightened East has Wu Peng, Wu Da, Wu Yang, Wu Lu, Wu Fan, and Wu Xiang. [Note] All Gods
witch
Source glyph
witch
Name meaning
In ancient times, it was said that people who can subdue gods by dancing, pretend to be gods and ghosts, pretend to be people who specialize in superstitious activities and defraud money.

士

职业的人叫“巫”。甲骨文和金文
的字形是横坚放置着的儿根什
签,这是巫师用来占卜吉凶的道
具。
中王亞巫亚玉巫
ведьма
Ши
В древности людей, которые притворялись богами и призраками, чтобы молиться за других, называли «ведьмами».
Глифы на кости оракула и бронзовые надписи - это состояния Эргенши, помещенные Хэнцзяном, которые волшебники используют в качестве опоры.
Средний король Яву Яю ведьма
wū
1) * танцовщица-шаманка (заклинательница духов, дождя); шаманка, колдунья; чародейка; ведьма
2) шаман, колдун; чернокнижник; чародей, маг; заклинатель духов, некромант
3) шаманство; шаманский
巫文化 ист. шаманская культура (основанная на знахарстве, гаданиях)
4) * знахарь, лекарь; врачеватель
巫匠 врачеватель (знахарь) и гробовщик
